think_procedure: Identify the purpose of the knob 'log_min_duration_statement'.
Determine if the knob has a natural order or if it includes special values.
Check if the knob can accept values like -1 or 0 that signify a different function.
Understand that a value of -1 means to log all statements, while 0 means to log all statements regardless of duration.
Conclude that these special values indicate that the knob can perform differently based on its value.
